## HLQTYStakeChange type

Represents the change between two states of an HLQTY Stake.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type HLQTYStakeChange<T> = {
    stakeHLQTY: T;
    unstakeHLQTY?: undefined;
} | {
    stakeHLQTY?: undefined;
    unstakeHLQTY: T;
    unstakeAllHLQTY: boolean;
};
```
